Items.Description: An old lantern. It might still work.
Items.InitialLocationText: A lantern rests on a table.

Items.Description: A small key, likely for a chest.
Items.InitialLocationText: You see a key on a shelf.

Items.Description: A large, locked chest. It looks like it could contain something valuable.

Items.InitialLocationText: There is a clockwork egg in the corner.
There is a sword on the ground.
